title: 3 and Out - Kyler Murray Freakshow; McCarthy Ain't It; Chiefs Underrated D; Baker's Limitations; Jets Tank Time; CFB Mobile QB League; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Kyler Murray Freakshow; McCarthy Ain't It; Chiefs Underrated D; Baker's Limitations; Jets Tank Time; CFB Mobile QB League; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why Kyler Murray is a generational freak athlete, why it's already clear that the Cowboys Mike McCarthy hire was a mistake, why the Chiefs D is underrated, why Todd Bowles is the best DC in the league, why Baker Mayfield's delusions about his athletic ability is costing the Browns, why the pocket QB has become a dinosaur overnight, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
